Class ModalPortal

A component that manages the rendering of Lit templates given by the ModalController. It should be placed at the end of the <body> tag in you application like so:

 <!DOCTYPE html>
 <html>
   <head>
     <!-- meta, scripts, etc. -->
   </head>
   <body>
     <my-lit-app></my-lit-app>
     <modal-portal></modal-portal>
   </body>
 </html>

This element listens to the "removeModal" event. Upon receiving the event, it inspects the event's composedPath() the determine which modal the event came from and removes that one.

    • Defined in src/modal-portal.ts:81
